entry.title: Game: Guardian Heroes (X360, 2011) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Guardian Heroes (X360, 2011) (2)20171213
I played the remaining stages as other characters, including going
to the Coliseum for a while. I got through everything, although I
didn't get any of the Dark endings. 

Fun game! Barely worth the five dollars though. The remixed
graphics are way too blurry.

Total time: 4:09
  • Video Games
  • Guardian Heroes
  • X360
  • 2011

entry.title: Game: Guardian Heroes (X360, 2011)
entry.content:
Game: Guardian Heroes (X360, 2011)20171212
I made a graph of the structure of the stages and then wrote a
program to see every stage with the smallest number of times
through the entire game. It was a fun programming project.

Today, I actually played the game and I completed my "teal" line
and then I went down the "orange" line, but accidentally made the
wrong choice and went down the "pink" path after half-way point,
so I will have to switch those when I ultimately do the "pink"
path.

Teal   --- 1 2 [a] 4 [b] 7 [b] 10 [e] 17 [c] 23 [a] 27 30
Orange --- 1 2 [c] 3 [a] 6 [a] 11
Pink   ---                        [b] 14 [a] 18 [a] 24

I did the first time with Han on Normal and then the second time
with Randy on Easy. It was quite fun!

Total time: 1:43
  • Video Games
  • Guardian Heroes
  • X360
  • 2011

entry.title: Movie: War for the Planet of the Apes, starring Andy Serkis (2017)
entry.content:
Movie: War for the Planet of the Apes, starring Andy Serkis (2017)20171211
This was a very striking movie because of the lack of much talking
and the way that the non-humans were the heroes. The saga of the
story is very strange, because in the grand scheme of things,
nothing seems to be happening to the world. It's as-if all the
cataclysmic events for humanity happen off-screen, because we only
follow the story of this small trip of apes. It's so weird that
this is a series of movies.
  • Movies
  • 2017

entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 2 - Episode 3 - What Is Dead May Never Die (4)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 2 - Episode 3 - What Is Dead May Never Die (4)20171211
I really enjoyed how Tyrion dealt with his threats. I also
enjoyed the way that Sansa is slowly becoming a more interesting
character. It is very sad to see Theon making such a terrible
decision. It is also cute to have Sam and Gilly start connecting.

It's really interesting how everything Maester Luwin said to Bran
ended up being wrong!

It was cool that Yoren gave Arya the idea of the death list prayer.
  • TV Shows
  • Game of Thrones

entry.title: Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (23)
entry.content:
Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (23)20171209
I got to the very final battle against Rhapthorne and died after a
very long fight. It was extremely frustrating. If it were not such
a pain to grind in this game, I think I would grind and keep
going, but as it is I have lost the love for the game and will
just watch the ending and call it quits. Bummer.

Total time: 39:56
  • Video Games
  • Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King
  • 3DS
  • 2017

entry.title: Movie: The Mummy, starring Tom Cruise (2017)
entry.content:
Movie: The Mummy, starring Tom Cruise (2017)20171208
This movie was SO different than I expected it to be. I really
liked the bizarreness that you got from Tom Cruise's character
being the POV but having this weird curse on him. You really could
not tell if he was going to end up being good or bad... it was
pretty neat! The graphics and action were great and Annabelle
Wallis was excellent. I think there should have been some more
ancient Egypt scenes though, because I felt like that part of the
plot was a bit undercooked. The cave in Iraq was really awesome!
  • Movies
  • 2017

entry.title: Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (21)
entry.content:
Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (21)20171207
I played in the morning and got the flying bird then in the
evening, I did some grinding on the Slime Hill then got the
Darkleaf. The grinding was not very useful, since it was so hard
to hit anything. I really need to get the critical hit skills.

Total time: 35:14
  • Video Games
  • Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King
  • 3DS
  • 2017

entry.title: Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (20)
entry.content:
Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (20)20171206
I finally found the village! It was really well hidden. I then
fought the bird and nearly got creamed! I was really nervous. I
really don't like how all the bosses get rid of status buffs and
tension, it's like I can't actually use all the tools in the
game. There's no reason to build tension against normal enemies,
because they can be taken out easily otherwise, so what's the
point of the tension system at all?

Total time: 31:54
  • Video Games
  • Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King
  • 3DS
  • 2017

entry.title: Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (19)
entry.content:
Game: Dragon Quest 8: Journey of the Cursed King (3DS, 2017) (19)20171205
I finished the Pirate Cove and made my way to the next place, but
I wandered around for a long time and didn't find anywhere to
go. It was really weird. I guess I'll try harder tomorrow.

Total time: 30:20

entry.title: Game of Thrones - Season 2 - Episode 2 - The Night Lands (4)
entry.content:
Game of Thrones - Season 2 - Episode 2 - The Night Lands (4)20171204
Tyrion and Cersei had a great interaction. It was quite scary for
Ros... I like seeing how dangerous Littlefinger is. Theon's scene
is so terrible and it is so rough watching him make like the
worst mistake of his life. Yikes. Dany's scene was pretty
lame. When I originally watched these, since I binged so much,
you never really were annoyed at how little was happening,
because there was always the next episode. But, wow it moves
slow!
  • TV Shows
  • Game of Thrones
